feels.name: Love
feels.quote: An unmistakable delight shone forth from the blue eyes that met his, and the radiance seemed to light up all his future with mild sunshine.

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: An unmistakable delight shone forth from the blue eyes that met his, and the radiance seemed to light up all his future with mild sunshine.

feels.name: Happiness
feels.quote: Ideal happiness seemed to be an affair of a few weeks’ waiting, more or less.

feels.name: Passion
feels.quote: He had never felt so passionately towards her as at this moment.

Places.name: Drawingroom
Places.description: The great old-fashioned window was opened to the summer scents of the garden at the back of the house.
